polimi.reds.broker.overlay
Class AlreadyNeighborException

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      java.lang.Exception
          java.io.IOException
              java.net.SocketException
                  java.net.ConnectException
                      polimi.reds.broker.overlay.AlreadyNeighborException
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class AlreadyNeighborException
extends java.net.ConnectException

Thrown to indicate that the node to add as a neighbor is already a neighbor of the local node. It includes the NodeDescriptor of the node to add.

See Also:
